content: We're seeing rate limit errors in production. Our monitoring shows we're only at 800 req/min but getting throttled. This is blocking our deployment.
I've checked your account and I see the spikes. The rate limiting is being triggered because of burst traffic patterns. Let me adjust your burst limit to accommodate these spikes.
@team This customer might need to be moved to our enterprise plan given their usage patterns. Will need to coordinate with billing.
Urgent: Our Kubernetes cluster isn't scaling despite high load. We're at risk of service degradation.
I've identified the issue - your HPA configuration is using a custom metric that's not being properly collected. I'll guide you through the fix.
